about_text_2: My name is Radomyr, I am 17 years old, and I am a software and web developer. I enjoy Python and C++, and I also know JavaScript.
about_text_3: I love reading about economics and urbanization, and I am interested in history. My other interests include programming, designing, and reading Wikipedia.
about_text_4: I enjoy geography, computer science, and law.
about_text_5: I live in Ukraine. My birthday is on October 23rd.

cookie_policy_text_3: Cookies are small text files stored on your device (computer, tablet, smartphone) when you visit websites. They are used to help the website remember information about your interaction with it.
cookie_policy_text_5: We use cookies on our site solely to customize and improve the user experience. This includes:
cookie_policy_text_7: Collecting technical information to analyze the site‚Äôs performance.
cookie_policy_text_9: We use both temporary (session) and persistent cookies. Temporary cookies are stored on your device only during the session, while persistent cookies remain on your device until they are deleted or expire.
cookie_policy_text_11: You can control cookie use through your browser settings. You have the option to delete cookies that are already stored or disable them altogether. However, please note that this may affect the functionality of the site.
cookie_policy_text_13: We reserve the right to change this policy at any time. All changes will be posted on this page. We recommend that you periodically review this policy to stay informed of any updates.
cookie_policy_text_15: If you have any questions or comments regarding this cookie policy, please contact us via email on our site.
